remarks: The group operation of the translation group is function composition. (Contributed by NM, 5-Jun-2013.)
statement:
tgrpset.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tgrpset.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tgrpset.g $e |- G = ( ( TGrp ` K ) ` W ) $.
tgrp.o $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
tgrpopr $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> .+ = ( f e. T , g e. T |-> ( f o. g ) ) ) $.
$d K f g $.
$d T f g $.
$d W f g $.
$d f g $.
$d f g $.
